title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For using a correct equation relating distance, speed, and time

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For each correct force that is correctly labeled, is attached to the dot, and has an arrowhead pointing in the correct direction, 1 point was awarded.

1 point is earned: For each incorrect vector, a point was deducted, with the minimum possible score being 0.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned: For each correct force that is correctly labeled, is attached to the dot, and has an arrowhead pointing in the correct direction, 1 point was awarded.

1 point is earned: For each incorrect vector, a point was deducted, with the minimum possible score being 0.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For recognizing that the sum of the forces upon the sled is zero

∑ F=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaabqaeaaca WGgbGaeyypa0JaaGimaaWcbeqab0GaeyyeIuoaaaa@3A95@

Writing the equation for the forces acting along the slope,

∑ F=mgsin15°−f=0, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaabqaeaaca WGgbGaeyypa0JaamyBaiaadEgaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaaIXaGa aGynaiabgclaWkabgkHiTiaadAgacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaaiilaaWcbe qab0GaeyyeIuoaaaa@463F@ where f represents the force of friction

1 point is earned: For equating the force of kinetic friction with the component of weight that acts down the slope
f = mg sin15°
f = (25kg) (9.8m/s2) sin 15°

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

f = 63.4 N (64.7 N if g = 10 m/s2 is used)

Note: Only 1 point was awarded for the correct answer with no supporting work.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For equating the force of kinetic friction to the product of the coefficient of friction and the normal force

f=μN ∑ F=mgcos15°−N=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGMb Gaeyypa0JaeqiVd0MaamOtaaqaamaaqaeabaGaamOraiabg2da9iaa d2gacaWGNbGaci4yaiaac+gacaGGZbGaaGymaiaaiwdacqGHWcaScq GHsislcaWGobGaeyypa0JaaGimaaWcbeqab0GaeyyeIuoaaaaa@49F3@

1 point is earned: For equating the normal force to the component of the sled’s weight that is normal to the slope

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For implicitly or explicitly stating that the velocity of the sled decreases

1 point is earned: For explicitly stating that the acceleration of the sled is constant

1 point is earned: For sketching a horizontal non-zero line

1 point is earned: For sketching a line of constant negative slope that begins at the right-hand end of the previously drawn horizontal line and also indicating the time on the graph

Note: The second point was awarded only if the first point was awarded.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned: For implicitly or explicitly stating that the velocity of the sled decreases

1 point is earned: For explicitly stating that the acceleration of the sled is constant

1 point is earned: For sketching a horizontal non-zero line

1 point is earned: For sketching a line of constant negative slope that begins at the right-hand end of the previously drawn horizontal line and also indicating the time on the graph

Note: The second point was awarded only if the first point was awarded.
